sentences.en: Annette's performance as Eliza Doolittle in "Pygmalion" was truly memorable.
sentences.cn: 安妮特在《卖花女》中扮演的伊丽莎·杜利特尔这个角色实在令人难忘。

sentences.en: Based on George Bernard Shaw's 1913 play Pygmalion, the film swept the Academy Awards.
sentences.cn: 该片以萧伯纳1913年的剧作《皮格马利翁》为蓝本, 夺得了多项奥斯卡奖.

trans.tran_cn: <希神>皮格马利翁，卖花女（英国剧作家萧伯纳之作品人物）
trans.tran_en: a king of Cyprus, who fell in love with the statue of a woman he had sculpted and which his prayers brought to life as Galatea
